biotools.summary:
An open-source automated experimental platform for biological science research.

By combining heating, stirring, liquid handling, spectrometry, and optogenetics into a single easy-to-use platform, Chi.Bio can simplify laboratory protocols and drastically reduce equipment costs. No more will tired graduate students need to stay late in the lab to induce experiments, or run samples between incubators and plate readers.
